title: How to Use AAA Batteries As AA Batteries

steps.title: Get your device that needs AA batteries and get your AAA batteries.
steps.content: Get your device that needs AA batteries and get your AAA batteries. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Grab some aluminum foil.
steps.content: Grab some aluminum foil. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the AAA batteries into your device's battery slot.
steps.content: Place the AAA batteries into your device's battery slot. You will obviously see some extra space in the slot, since the AAA batteries are smaller than AA batteries. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Rip a piece of aluminum foil and curl it into a small ball.
steps.content: Rip a piece of aluminum foil and curl it into a small ball. The size of the ball should be the same size of the extra space in your device's battery slot. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Place the aluminum foil in the gap.
steps.content: Place the aluminum foil in the gap. The aluminum foil should be on the battery's negative terminal, not the positive. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. Your device will be able to work.
